message: I'm thrilled to offer you this amazing product for $10000. I've sold many products before, and I can confidently say that this one is a top-notch item. In fact, I've sold 10 high-quality products out of 50 total products so far. I'm sure you'll love it! Will you take it home today?

Your previous sales record shows a 20% success rate for high-quality products, which is significantly lower than the advertised 80% chance. I'd like to see more evidence of your high-quality products before I commit to purchasing.
